clinical_study.brief_title: Real World Evidence of the Effectiveness of Paritaprevir/r - Ombitasvir, ± Dasabuvir, ± Ribavirin in Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C - An Observational Study in Hungary - VERITAS
clinical_study.official_title: Real World Evidence of the Effectiveness of Paritaprevir/r - Ombitasvir, ± Dasabuvir, ± Ribavirin in Patients With Chronic Hepatitis C - An Observational Study in Hungary - VERITAS

brief_summary.textblock: The study seeks to provide evidence of the effectiveness and obtain patient reported outcome (PRO) and work productivity data of the interferon-free regimen of Paritaprevir (PTV)/ritonavir (r) + Ombitasvir (OBV), ± Dasabuvir (DSV), ± Ribavirin in chronic hepatitis C virus infected participants.

primary_outcome.measure: The Percentage of Participants Achieving Sustained Virological Response 12 weeks Post-treatment (SVR12)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 12 weeks after the last dose of study drug
primary_outcome.description: Hepatitis C virus ribonucleic acid (HCV RNA) levels less than the lower limit of quantification 12 weeks after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Patient Support Program (PSP) Utilization and Satisfaction Assessment
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire to evaluate the frequency of use and satisfaction with the patient support program

secondary_outcome.measure: The Percentage of Participants Achieving Sustained Virological Response 24 weeks Post-treatment (SVR24)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 24 weeks after the last dose of study drug
secondary_outcome.description: HCV RNA less than the lower limit of quantification 24 weeks after the last dose of study drug

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Participants Workability measured with the Work Productivity and Activity Impairment (WPAI):Hepatitis C Questionnaire
secondary_outcome.description: Questionnaire measures work time missed, work and non-work activity impairment due to a specified healthy problem during the past seven days.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Missed RBV Treatment Days in Relation to the Target Number of RBV Treatment Days
Change of Participant Activation with the Patient Activation Measure (PAM-13) Questionnaire
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 to end of treatment, maximum week 24
secondary_outcome.description: PAM 13 is a measure used to assess the patient knowledge, skill, and confidence for self-management.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change in Participants Quality of Life measured with the EuroQol 5 Dimension 5 Level (EQ-5D-5L) Questionnaire
secondary_outcome.description: Five items in the EQ-5D-5L questionnaire (mobility, self-care, usual activities, pain/discomfort, and anxiety/depression) are rated on 5 levels of severity.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Participants with Concomitant Medications
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Day 0 to end of treatment, maximum week 24
secondary_outcome.description: Concomitant medication used from the time when the decision is made to initiate treatment with the PTV/r+OBV±DSV±RBV until after the last dose
Case report form collection will evaluate the usage pattern of the treatment regimen

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of the Direct Acting Antiviral (DAA) Dose taken in Relation to the Target Dose of DAA
secondary_outcome.description: Cumulative dose taken divided by target dose in percent

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of the Ribavirin (RBV) dose taken in relation to the target dose of RBV
secondary_outcome.description: Cumulative dose taken divided by target dose in percent

arm_group.description: GT1 participants receiving PTV/r+OBV+DSV+RBV for 24 weeks
GT1 participants receiving PTV/r+OBV+DSV for 12 weeks
GT4 participants receiving PTV/r+OBV+RBV for 12 weeks
GT4 participants receiving PTV/r+OBV+RBV for 24 weeks
GT1 participants receiving PTV/r+OBV+DSV+RBV for 12 weeks

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Treatment-naïve or -experienced adult male or female patients with confirmed chronic hepatitis C (CHC), genotype 1 and 4, receiving combination therapy with the interferon-free Paritaprevir (PTV)/ritonavir (r) + Ombitasvir (OBV), ± Dasabuvir (DSV), ± Ribavirin (PTV/r+OBV±DSV±RBV) according to standard of care and in line with the current local label.
- If RBV is co-administered with the PTV/r+OBV±DSV±RBV, it has been prescribed in line with the current local label (with special attention to contraception requirements and contraindication during pregnancy).
- Patients must voluntarily sign and date Subject Information Form and Informed Consent Form prior to inclusion into the study.
- Patient must not be participating or intending to participate in a concurrent interventional therapeutic trial.
- Patient has been started on PTV/r+OBV±DSV±RBV therapy no more than one (1) month prior to the study enrollment.
